mapper.select: select no, name, content, password ,to_char(req_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as req_date from GUESTBOOK order by req_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no = #{no } and password = #{password }
mapper.insert:
select guestbook_seq.nextval from dual
insert into GUESTBOOK VALUES(guestbook_seq.currval, #{name }, #{content } , #{password }, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from(select a.*, rownum rn from(select no, name, content, password ,to_char(req_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as req_date from GUESTBOOK order by req_date desc) a) where (#{page }-1)*5+1<=rn and rn <= #{page }*5
